DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate whether metabolic modulation improves left ventricular function, work capacity, insulin sensitivity and modifies substrate metabolism in chronic heart failure
DOC.brief_title: Effect of 4 Weeks Treatment With Acipimox in Patients With Chronic Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: EF<40 % IHD NYHAclass IIIII. pregnancy severe renal failure new brady or tachyArrhythmia Severe stenotic valvular disease myocardial infarction within last 6 weeks insulin treated diabetes mellitus peptic ulcer pregnancy or lactating women allergy towards tested medicine
